doc.field: McKim, Mead and White architectural records
McKim, Mead and White architectural records
Series VI: Newspaper and journal clippings
Series VI: Newspaper and journal clippings

This series consists primarily of newspaper and magazine clippings concerning McKim, Mead and White projects; also included are special reprints of clippings and of published photographs. The clippings were originally pasted in volumes which have been disbound due to their deteriorating condition.
